response.overview: The Film is a social-family drama, which underlines the traces of moral values in new generation. Film is based on Rajasthani backdrop, depicting beautiful unseen locations of villages of Rajasthan and uplifts their vibrant and colorful lives. But the central focus of film is on the issues of woman empowerment and independence. The film revolves around the ups and downs of the life of Rupali (character is being played by Suhani Gandhi - Miss India UK worldwide) life. Watch the full movie Mahari Supatar Beendani online, only on Eros Now.
response.title: Mahari Supatar Beendani
